data.title: A St. Baldrick's Participant
data.meta_description: Steve Dunham is shaving their head to raise money for childhood cancer research! With research being extremely underfunded, your donation will help make a difference for the thousands of infants, children, teens, and young adults fighting childhood cancers.
data.text:
When you give to the St. Baldrickâ€™s Foundation, you help support the work of the world's very best childhood cancer researchers.

We invest your donation wisely with researchers at hundreds of institutions worldwide, not just one hospital, and support the most innovative projects that are leading the way to cures for kids with cancer.

Why? Because we believe collaboration and investing in bright ideas works. And because kids, and their lives, are so worth it.
